nitin.name: Nitin
preferences: Comfort travel - middle tier (not luxury, not budget)
Vegetarian diet - needs vegetarian restaurant options
Extra leg room on flights (premium economy or exit row)
Prefers hotels with good amenities
Enjoys technology and innovation hubs
Interested in local food markets and sports
Interested in hiking, outdoor activities, and nature
Prefers destinations with good public transportation
Likes hotels with fitness centers and healthy breakfast options
Enjoys traveling to new places

tyler.name: Tyler
preferences: Prefers luxury hotels with spa facilities
Business class flights preferred
Enjoys fine dining and Michelin-starred restaurants
Interested in art museums and cultural experiences
Frequent traveler to Europe and Asia
Prefers direct flights when possible
Enjoys wine tasting and culinary tours
Likes boutique hotels with unique character
Appreciates concierge services and personalized attention

vishal.name: Arsene Vishal Wenger
preferences: Budget-conscious traveler
Prefers hostels or budget hotels (2-3 star)
Budget: $800-1500 per trip
Enjoys adventure travel
Prefers only expensive restaurants
Likes destinations in Southeast Asia and South America
Enjoys meeting other travelers in hostel common areas
Prefers overnight buses/trains to save on accommodation
Interested in free walking tours and budget-friendly attractions
Flexible with travel dates to get cheaper flights
